testcase.name: It should show today's menu on meal order page
It should add meal to cart if meal's add button is clicked
It should not add meal to cart if meal has already been added to cart
It should navigate to cart and place order

failure.message: Testing if element <.Toastify__toast-body> contains text: "Order has been created".

testcase.name: It should not remove meal from cart if only one meal is left
It should remove meal from cart if delete is clicked
It should navigate to order history section and show order details when table row is clicked
It should show add order to cart when order edit button is clicked
